message: what you think about this "super heroes" show?.. after the shut down of "Heroes", maybe this one could replace it.. hehe

No, this one is not nearly as dark.  It's way more lighthearted. I am still reserving judgement. Most of the plot lines seem very melodramatic, the comedy doesn't have a lot of payoff, but I am still really intrigued by the premise.  If anything it fills that "The Incredibles" hole for me.
oh true.. is like the "The incredibles" movie.. I see..
This show is awesome!! Absolutely love it
@Jbudone yeah, I got some fun in some episode atm.. hehe, Im at episode 8 for now =), I started to see it 2 days ago :D

This show is something I put on in the background.  I am not too offended by it.  Starting to stagnate though - they need to open it up a bit more.  Heroes was *properly* offensive in how the lazy writers insulted the audience and the characters seemed to never learn anything.  If you want a superior show to Heroes - then watch Misfits....FAR better.  The biggest disappointment for me in 'No Ordinary Family' is watching how low Detective Mackey has dropped.....from a badass to a sadass....
....and a bit of a fatass too! :)
I never seen Heroes.  I like No Ordinary Family, but I don't think they will make it to a 2nd season.
I actually liked that show. But I also don't think it'll get a 2nd season.
yeah, Im thinking the same way.. the rating isnt too high for the producer to make a 2nd season.. =(
